overview: How queer can TV be? It's a Queer World is a global survey of the tastiest bits from contemporary lesbian and gay TV shows. Highlights of this fast-moving collage include clips from Berlin's "Lasbich TV", the Dutch version of "Out on Tuesday", and a very weird kids program: "The Thea annd Theo Show". It's hosted by Lily Savage, England's first lady of drag
title: It's a Queer World
